title: Slackspace Requirements Catalogue
_comment: This draft document provides example data for a requirements catalogue used by Slackspace Consulting Services and may be used as template when transposing requirements from source documents.

requirements._comment: Requirements.type can be any of: Control Criteria | Implementation Guidance | Implementation Example | Testing Requirement
requirements.text: The entity demonstrates a commitment to integrity and ethical values.

mapping._comment: mapping.type = [equivalent | subset | superset | related | none]; mapping.origin = [manual review | AI Analysis | source doc | other]

notes.text: GOP related organizations cannot pass this control requirement.
notes.author: Slackspace
notes._comment: notes can be used to provide additional context or information about the requirement to the auditor.

testPlans.description: Review ethics training logs and signed code of conduct attestations for at least 2 years.
testPlans.author: Slackspace

requirements.text: Organizational leadership is responsible and accountable for cybersecurity risk and fosters a culture that is risk-aware, ethical, and continually improving.
